question: [Detailed] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (94, 160), (89, 143), (194, 67).

qas.question: [Detailed] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (94, 160), (89, 143), (194, 67).
[Explain] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (94, 160), (89, 143), (194, 67). Provide only the area.
[Explain] Norsk: Finn areal og omkrets for trekanten med punktene (94, 160), (89, 143), (194, 67). Provide only the perimeter.
